definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
key (on a piano or computer keyboard)/button (on a mouse or other device)/chemical bond/linchpin
home page (of a website)/title page/front page/first page/fig. beginning/cover letter
tab window (in a web browser etc)/paging/pagination/page break (computing)
the top of the page/(word processing) page header
catalog/table of contents/directory (on computer hard drive)/list/contents
